section.p: You have successfully navigated the dangerous waters of Disaster Bay. Up ahead, your lookout spots an island.
‘That be Bazalek Isle,’ says your mate, ‘No one who has landed there has ever got back alive - I’d advise against it, unless you’ve a map or something, cap’n.’

choices.choice: North along the coast to Yarimura
East towards the Isle of Mystery
Drop anchor and explore Bazalek Isle
